title: iyarkkai enrunai
sahitya:
iyarkkai enrunai uraippAr shilar iNangum aim-bhUtangaL enruraippAr shilar


anupallavi

  sheyarkkaiyin shakti enbAr uyirt-tIyenbAr arivenbAr IshanenbAr


caraNam    viyappura tAL ninakkE ingu vELvi sheidiDum engaL Om ennum
nayappaDum adu uNDE shiva nATTiyam kATTi aruL purivAr
